document.full_text: the mountain community of garmisch-partenkirchen will hold a referendum in may to decide whether they want to be part of the 2018 munich winter olympics bid, in a move that could damage the german city's chances.
document.title: garmisch to vote on munich 2018
lines_and_colors: the mountain community of garmisch-partenkirchen will hold a referendum in may to decide whether they want to be part of the 2018 munich winter olympics bid, in a move that could damage the german city's chances.
